ygData.subject: Newbie Necro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I m making a newbie necro on  regular sever (E ci) and I need some advice. I had a DE necro up to 5, but then i noticed everyone is a DE, so I quit
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all, I'm making a newbie necro on regular sever (E'ci) and I need
some advice. I had a DE necro up to 5, but then i noticed everyone is a DE,
so I quit him. I'm thinking of making a erudite now, but then the iksar had
to come along. Anyone tried an iksar as a necro? How are they? Well, if I
dont go with an iksar and make a erudite I would probably take my 30 points
and bring 70 agi up to 80 agi and 117 int up to 137 int. Is this smart? I
plan to twink him, so he will probably have 190+ int from the start unless i
opt for mana jewelry. Also, if I made him a erudite where would i be liked
and disliked? Thanks very much for your time, and any other tips would be
appreciated.

-Kendan Boozehound
48th druid of E'ci
